summary: Backend-Focused Software Engineer with 4+ years of experience building scalable Node.js applications and microservices. Excels in designing RESTful APIs, integrating cloud services (AWS, GCP), and collaborating with cross-functional teams. Recognized for top-tier problem-solving (Top 2.5% on LeetCode) and a focus on high availability, performance, and secure deployments.

details: üèÖ GPA: 3.79, Top 4% of class.
Sharpened data structures and algorithms proficiency in Python, Go, and C++ through 1,000+ problems, reinforcing ability to rapidly solve complex backend logic.
Secured Top 2.5% LeetCode status by demonstrating exceptional analytical skills, teamwork, and a dedication to continuous improvement in software development.
Architected scalable Node.js microservices integrated with AWS (Lambda, S3, EC2) and GCP for robust data processing, ensuring high availability and performance optimizations.
Built RESTful APIs leveraging TypeScript and Express.js for seamless data exchange across multiple frontends, coupled with Jest for unit and integration testing.
Implemented Docker and Kubernetes for containerization and orchestration, reducing infrastructure complexities and streamlining deployment pipelines.

items.role: Africa to Silicon Valley | Backend & Team Lead
details: Spearheaded the backend development of RateEat using Node.js and NestJS with MongoDB and Redis, introducing microservices that efficiently handled food delivery workflows in an emerging market.
Oversaw database optimizations in PostgreSQL and MySQL, improving query performance by 30% and ensuring reliable transaction handling in distributed systems.
Collaborated directly with junior developers, establishing coding standards, performing code reviews, and guiding best practices for continuous integration and deployment (GitHub Actions, Docker).
Developed backend services in Node.js and Python (Flask), focusing on secure authentication (JWT/OAuth) and flexible schema design with PostgreSQL and MySQL.
Elevated application resilience by adopting TDD methodologies with Mocha, Chai, and Jest, resulting in a 20% decrease in production bugs and improved developer confidence.
Participated in cross-team architectural discussions, integrating containerized services with Docker and Kubernetes for improved scalability.
Introduced a Node.js microservice architecture to power mobile payment systems in Ethiopia, employing AWS Lambda and S3 for cost-effective data handling.
Implemented TypeScript to enhance maintainability and developer productivity, ensuring consistent coding standards across services.
Led backend implementation with NestJS and GraphQL for real-time restaurant ratings, enabling faster data retrieval and improved user interaction.
Integrated performance tuning with Redis caching and load balancing strategies, achieving a 25% boost in overall API response times.
Programming Languages: JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, Go, C/C++, Bash/Shell scripting
Backend & Frameworks: Node.js, Express.js, NestJS, Flask, RESTful APIs, GraphQL
Databases: PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Redis
Cloud & DevOps: AWS (Lambda, S3, EC2, EKS), GCP, Docker, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions
Methodologies & Tools: Microservices Architecture, TDD, CI/CD, Agile (Scrum/Kanban), Git
Maintained a top 2.5% global ranking on LeetCode, reflecting strong analytical and backend problem-solving competencies.
Consistently led development teams across multiple projects, promoting code quality, scalable architectures, and prompt delivery.
